member.name: M:DialogLib.DialogLib.LoadClips(System.String)
member.summary: Loads audio clips from a bundle into which allows the mod to use them. If you're using embedded resources not in a bundle, the clips are automatically loaded.
member.param: full name of the bundle without the file extension

member.name: M:DialogLib.DialogLib.LoadClips(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads audio clips from a bundle into which allows the mod to use them. If you're using embedded resources not in a bundle, the clips are automatically loaded.
member.param: name of the bundle without the file extension

member.name: M:DialogLib.DialogLib.LoadClips(BTD_Mod_Helper.BloonsMod)
member.summary: Loads audio clips from every bundle from the provided mod into which allows this mod to use them. If you're using embedded resources not in a bundle, the clips are automatically loaded.
